name: app-vitals-marketplace
description: A marketplace of Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: ralph-orchestrator
plugins.description: Structured orchestration for Ralph loops with PRD support, progress tracking, TDD guidance, and escape hatches

plugins.name: damage-control
plugins.description: Defense-in-depth protection for Claude Code. Blocks dangerous commands and protects sensitive files via PreToolUse hooks. Features pattern-based blocking, ask confirmations, and three-tier path protection.

plugins.name: learning-loop
plugins.description: Captures corrections, discoveries, and preferences as you work with Claude. Stores learnings in CLAUDE.md, promotes to global scope, and helps contribute improvements back to marketplace plugins.

plugins.name: pr-review
plugins.description: Interactive PR review workflow with local drafts, CLAUDE.md compliance checking, auto-detected follow-ups, and parallel batch processing via cloud-agent.

plugins.name: meeting-transcripts
plugins.description: Browse and read meeting transcripts captured by the mt CLI tool. Provides a /transcripts command to list, search, and read recordings by time reference.

plugins.name: distill
plugins.description: Distill conversations into persistent context files. Extracts long-term facts, goals, and decisions into your project's context/ directory before clearing.
